first_tutorial_window: Hi {name}! Press "Play" if you want go through the tutorial before starting the game.
second_tutorial_window: Goal of this game is to push log to the top of the screen using cards. Let me show you which cards you have.
third_tutorial_window: But before that. This is corn. You can use cards for it.
fourth_tutorial_window: And now press on the sheep to summon it for corn. It's going to bump into log and push it.
fifth_tutorial_window: And this is farm. We grow corn on there. Just drag and place it where you want to build it. To win, build more farms.
sixth_tutorial_window: How about building a pasture? It will summon sheep on its own!
seventh_tutorial_window: Looking good. Will you manage without my help?
eigth_tutorial_window: Let's go! I didn't doubt your victory. I have a present for you - the chest to celebrate your first victory. Come on, open it!
nineth_tutorial_window: Wow! This is a piece of a map! But to make it work, we need to find the rest of it... I'm sure it won't be a problem for you.
tenth_tutorial_window: Let's save this shard in your profile before it gets lost.
eleventh_tutorial_window: There will be stored all your cards. Also, you can choose cards you'll take to the game.
twelfth_tutorial_window: You can get more chests by winning in battles or buying them in the shop.
thirteenth_tutorial_window: Oof. I've told you everything you need for the great start. See you in the game. Good luck!
event_end_text: It's time to end this season, rests cups and start anew!
card_sheep_desc: Flying forward and pushing log to the opponent's side!
card_bigSheep_desc: It may not be as fast as regular sheep but stronger!
card_bee_desc: Flying forward and pushing log to the opponent's side!
card_crashedPlane_desc: Creates a wind current pushing the characters and the log
card_deadFarm_desc: Brings much corn but takes up a lot of space
card_fastSheep_desc: Flying at the speed of light!
card_necromancerSheep_desc: Bonded with soul of a dead sheep
card_icePeak_desc: Freezes log for short amount of time
card_potion_desc: Increases impact from units bumping into the log
card_royalSheep_desc: Royalty sheep with a royal escort
card_mole_desc: Tears up squares on the opponent's field. No buildings can be built on the ripped squares for a certain period of time
card_cycloneSheep_desc: Blows the log away with his tornado
card_balloonBase_desc: Creates balloon mines that explode on contact with a flying object
card_invisibleSheep_desc: Invulnerable to all influences, only becomes visible when flying up to a log
waiting_text: Trying to find a suitable opponent

Press button below to interact with me.
